trans-unit.source: Provides type conversion analogous behavior for <xref href="System.Windows.Setter"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Trigger"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Condition"></xref> types that deal with <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Fornece o comportamento de semelhante de conversão de tipo para <xref href="System.Windows.Setter"> </xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Trigger"> </xref> e <xref href="System.Windows.Condition"> </xref> tipos que lidam com <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: This converter only supports <xref uid="langword_csharp_ConvertFrom" name="ConvertFrom" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Este conversor só suporta <xref uid="langword_csharp_ConvertFrom" name="ConvertFrom" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: SetterTriggerConditionValueConverter is not intended for use by user code, it supports WPF feature areas such as processing <xref:System.Windows.Setter>, <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> and <xref:System.Windows.Condition> in templates.
trans-unit.target: SetterTriggerConditionValueConverter não se destina para utilização por código de utilizador suporta a áreas de funcionalidade do WPF, tais como processamento <xref:System.Windows.Setter>, <xref:System.Windows.Trigger>e <xref:System.Windows.Condition>em modelos.</xref:System.Windows.Condition> </xref:System.Windows.Trigger> </xref:System.Windows.Setter>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.SetterTriggerConditionValueConverter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.SetterTriggerConditionValueConverter"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the converter can convert from a source object to a side-effect-produced <xref href="System.Windows.Setter"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Trigger"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Condition"></xref> .
trans-unit.target: Devolve um valor que indica se o conversor pode converter de um objeto de origem para um lado efeito-produzida <xref href="System.Windows.Setter"> </xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Trigger"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Windows.Condition"> </xref> .

trans-unit.source: This implementation only returns `true` for `sourceType` of <xref:System.String> or a byte array.
trans-unit.target: Esta implementação só devolve `true` para `sourceType` de <xref:System.String>ou uma matriz de bytes.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> que fornece um contexto de formato.

trans-unit.source: The type to convert from.
trans-unit.target: O tipo para converter do.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the converter can perform the conversion; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o conversor pode efetuar a conversão; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the converter can convert to the specified destination type.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um valor que indica se o conversor pode converter para o tipo de destino especificado.

trans-unit.source: Always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve sempre <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> que fornece um contexto de formato.

trans-unit.source: The type to convert to.
trans-unit.target: O tipo a converter.

trans-unit.source: Always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve sempre <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Converts the converted source value if an underlying type converter can be obtained from context.
trans-unit.target: Converte o valor da origem convertida se um conversor de tipos subjacente pode ser obtido a partir do contexto.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise returns an unconverted source.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, devolve uma origem não convertida.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> que fornece um contexto de formato.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> to use as the current culture.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>para utilizar como a cultura atual.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The object to convert.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a converter.

trans-unit.source: The converter object, or possibly an unconverted source.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de conversor ou possivelmente uma origem não convertida.

trans-unit.source: context or source is .
trans-unit.target: contextor source is .

trans-unit.source: No <xref href="System.Xaml.IXamlSchemaContextProvider"></xref> service available.
trans-unit.target: Não <xref href="System.Xaml.IXamlSchemaContextProvider"> </xref> serviço disponível.

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified object to the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Converte o objeto especificado para o tipo especificado.

trans-unit.source: Always throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: Sempre emite uma exceção.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> que fornece um contexto de formato.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> to use as the current culture.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>para utilizar como a cultura atual.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The object to convert.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a converter.

trans-unit.source: The type to convert to.
trans-unit.target: O tipo a converter.

trans-unit.source: Always throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: Sempre emite uma exceção.

trans-unit.source: Thrown in all cases.
trans-unit.target: Emitida em todos os casos.
